name: Core_StringBuffer_prependBytes
signature: Core_Result Core_StringBuffer_prependBytes(Core_StringBuffer* SELF, Core_Natural8 const* bytes, Core_Size numberOfBytes);

parameters.name: bytes
parameters.description: A pointer to an array of @{code('numberOfBytes')} Bytes.

parameters.name: numberOfBytes
parameters.description: The number of Bytes in the array pointed to by @{code('bytes')}.

success: The Byte sequence is a valid UTF-8 Byte sequence and was prepended to the UTF-8 Byte sequence of this  @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object.

errors.errorCondition: The Byte sequence is not a valid UTF-8 Byte sequence.

description: Prepend a UTF-8 Byte sequence to the UTF-8 Byte sequence of this @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
This function fails only with the specified errors/error conditions.
